title: Cointoday
description:
Cointoday is a software to convert amount between currencies in a simple way.

It is a easy Frontend to the CoinConvert API.
I have no connection to CoinConvert development.

This project has a github repository, which anyone can contribute or just checkout the source code.

title: Grupo Markha Website
description:
Project that I build for Grupo Markha. In this project I developed the website and connected it with a eGesto instance.

In the website, we can see some informations about Products, News and etc. All the informations is fetched from eGesto database, and can be easily updated.

I have only developed the website.
Images aren't made by me.

title: eGesto
description:
eGesto is a system that was build to be used by Grupo Markha inside their operations.

This software was build to resolve a specific problem, which is price generation, it consider the production cost, the specific taxes and offcource the profit margin to generate the product price.
We have added more functions to eGesto too, it can manage the content from a website and save the customers informations for example.

eGesto will be open sourced in some time.
